page.title: 07Saturday:by Neil Stringer
page.content: I got up at 8.30pm and got dressed quickly to go to the park.I did not bother having breakfast.When we got there I took off my shoes,socks,tee_ shirt and pants.I had my shorts on underneath.I got in the Big Park pond. There are some tadpoles,jacksharks and frogs in there.The water was freezing cold.My dog,Snoopy and I played in the pond for half an hour.I dried myself and we walked home.I made some banana flavour milk shake and put two ice cubes in it.I had bacon butties for dinner.In the afternoon I went collecting golf balls.I can get Â£2 for ten balls if I sell them at the golf course or Â£1.50 if my dad sells them at work for me.I found four.The most I ever found in one day was seven.I came home for tea,king ribs, and went out to play football with my friends till 8o'clock.
